title: (x) Tagline serif face on Scream movie poster - Adobe Garamond {Jacob Sievers}
content:
it is located at the top of the scream movie poster

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [scream\_movie\_poster2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091205085827/http:/typophile.com/files/scream_movie_poster2.jpg) | 44.59 KB |
author: andrei08

comments.content: This could be Minion electronically condensed and blurred

If the poster is this:  
 [http://www.cinemasterpieces.com/screamjan08.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091205085827/http:/www.cinemasterpieces.com/screamjan08.jpg "http://www.cinemasterpieces.com/screamjan08.jpg")  
the blur is just compression artifacts.
Slimbach, yes. Minion, no. It looks more like Adobe Garamond.
